Activity: Wake up, read technical blogs and news.
Arrive at the office, check emails and respond to urgent requests.
Review progress on the asset import tool and plan for integration.
Email @3dmod-1 to schedule a short demonstration of the asset import tool. Subject: Asset Import Tool Demonstration.
Prepare a demonstration of the asset import tool for @3dmod-1. Highlight its features and benefits.
Demonstrate the asset import tool to @3dmod-1. Gather feedback and address any questions or concerns.
Based on feedback from @3dmod-1, make necessary adjustments and improvements to the asset import tool. E.g., fixing bugs or adding new features.
Lunch break. Research best practices for tool integration with game engine pipelines.
Begin integrating the asset import tool with the game engine's asset pipeline. Ensure a seamless workflow for 3D modelers.
Address any compatibility issues or conflicts that arise during integration.
Update the documentation for the asset import tool to reflect the integration process.
Conduct thorough testing of the integrated asset import tool to ensure its stability and reliability.
Prepare a brief training session for 3D modelers on how to use the integrated asset import tool.
